actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to exclude certain property in the State of South Dakota.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to prohibit the transfer without compensation from the Administrator of General Services to the Secretary of the Interior (to hold in trust for the benefit of such Indians) of excess real property located within the reservation of any group, band, or tribe of Indians in South Dakota that was acquired by the United States for construction and operation of reservoirs on the main stem of the Missouri River.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to exclude certain property in the State of South Dakota.
